articles.title: Oil price at $110 per barrel not sustainable, says Minister Hardeep Puri in Davos - Moneycontrol
articles.description: "The fact that it is not sustainable is seen in the countries around India. It is also being seen in Africa and Latin America," Puri said.
articles.content: Crude oil price at $110 per barrel is "not sustainable", India's petroleum minister Hardeep Singh Puri said on May 24 in Switzerland's Davos, where heads of states and global business leaders have ar… [+1782 chars]

articles.title: Biden angers China with vow to defend Taiwan - News24
articles.description: President Joe Biden that US forces would defend Taiwan militarily if China attempted to take control of the island by force, prompting Beijing to warn that America was "playing with fire."
articles.content:
• President Joe Biden has compared China's threat to self-ruled Taiwan to the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
